channel.title: math.SG updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.SG updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Symplectic structures preserved by geodesic symmetries
item.description: arXiv:2411.05702v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We investigate the study of the symplectic manifolds equipped with a symplectic connection whose geodesic symmetries are (local) symplectomorphisms. We call "S-type" these affine symplectic manifolds.
item.dc:creator: Pierre Bieliavsky, Maxime Willaert

item.title: Noncommutativity of monotone Lagrangian cobordisms
item.description: arXiv:2411.05724v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We construct a monotone spin Lagrangian cobordism from L to (L_1, L_2) such that there is no monotone spin Lagrangian cobordism from L to (L_2, L_1), where L, L_1, L_2 are Lagrangians of CP^7.
item.dc:creator: Vardan Oganesyan

item.title: A counterexample to Lagrangian Poincar\'e recurrence in dimension four
item.description: arXiv:2410.24102v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: Counterexamples to Lagrangian Poincar\'e recurrence were recently found in dimensions $\geq 6$ by Bro\'ci\'c and Shelukhin. We construct counterexamples in dimension 4 using almost toric fibrations.
item.dc:creator: Joel Schmitz

item.title: On the Equivalence of Generalized Ricci Curvatures
item.description: arXiv:2406.06695v3 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: We prove the equivalence between the several notions of generalized Ricci curvature found in the literature. As an application, we characterize when the total generalized Ricci tensor is symmetric.
item.dc:creator: Gil R. Cavalcanti, Jaime Pedregal, Roberto Rubio

item.title: K\"{a}hler compactification of $\mathbb{C}^n$ and Reeb dynamics
item.description: arXiv:2409.10275v2 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: Let $X$ be a smooth complex manifold. Assume that $Y\subset X$ is a K\"{a}hler submanifold such that $X\setminus Y$ is biholomorphic to $\mathbb{C}^n$. We prove that $(X, Y)$ is biholomorphic to the standard example $(\mathbb{P}^n, \mathbb{P}^{n-1})$. We then study certain K\"{a}hler orbifold compactifications of $\mathbb{C}^n$ and prove that on $\mathbb{C}^3$ the flat metric is the only asymptotically conical Ricci-flat K\"{a}hler metric whose metric cone at infinity has a smooth link. As a key technical ingredient, we derive a new characterization of minimal discrepancy of isolated Fano cone singularities by using $S^1$-equivariant positive symplectic homology.
item.dc:creator: Chi Li, Zhengyi Zhou
